original: RECITALS WHEREAS, Vivint Solar and Vivint are affiliate business entities, under the common control and ownership of 313 Acquisition, LLC, a Delaware limited liability company.
modified: RECITALS WHEREAS, Vivint Solar and Vivint function as independent business entities, each maintaining its unique identity while being interconnected through shared oversight by 313 Acquisition, LLC, a Delaware limited liability company acting as their common controlling entity.
